name: Guild Castle
typedesc: Blueprints are used to build certain buildings in the guild. When used it spawns building with the base level (1) that can be upgraded in the future
fulldesc: When built provides maintenance for other buildings. Holds guild funds, can gather taxes

levels.desc: Allows to check guild status, set claim tax up to 5%, keeps othe buildings in good shape
Allows to set claim tax up to 10%
Allows to set claim tax up to 25%

name: Hero Residence
fulldesc: Allows hero to join the guild. Hero will be chosen depending on amount of followers in this guild. Leveling up makes other heroes to consider your guild more

levels.desc: Allows hero to join the guild
Gives 3 days for hero to change their mind to change the guild if amound of followers increases
Makes current hero will 20% less likely to consider other guilds

name: Auction House
fulldesc: When built users will be able to sell cards on global card auction shared between all servers

levels.desc: Allows users to auction cards globally
Allows users to specify auction length (1 to 10 hours)

name: Smithing Hub
fulldesc: When built users will be able to forge cards together and use vials to draw new cards. Details: `->help forge` and `->help draw`

levels.desc: Allows users to forge two cards
Allows users to liquify cards and draw a card using vials
Allows users to forge effects using recipies

name: Gacha Bank
fulldesc: When built and upgraded, adds 4-star cards to a claim pool and increases default daily

levels.desc: Enables 4-star drop when claiming in this guild
Adds user level amount of {currency} to guild balance when user runs `->daily`

name: Legendary Card Claim Ticket
typedesc: Claim tickets are used to claim cards of certain rarity or collection. They are usually awarded during events or for completing quests and collections
fulldesc: When used gives you legendary card. The collection is determined when awarded
